title: Labels from Martha Stewart Living PDF
author: dgutride

comments.content:
Do you have a link to the pdf? If the words are scalable, it might be an embedded font -- which the pdf reader can identify.  
Don
It looks like **[Kursivschrift Stehend Haar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123714/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kursivschrift/)** by German Cartographic Design

Thanks all - @fvilanakis - that looks close... @donshottype - The pdf is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123714/http:/images.marthastewart.com/images/content/web/pdfs/2008Q4/msl_1208_lg_rect_lipbalms_1a.pdf)

Based on the unlabeled vector image in the pdf

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123714im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KursivschriftStehendHaarAtMarthaStewart_4477.jpg)
  
I have no doubt that Kursivschrift Stehend Haar, as suggested by Fivos, is correct.  
Don
